name: wpError
function
func:
msg.collection = "series"
msg.payload =
{
    "_id": objectid(msg.fromApp._id),
    "deleted": false,
    "name": msg.payload.name,
    "description": msg.payload.description,
    "slug": msg.payload.slug,

    "wooCommerceId": msg.payload.id,
    "parent": +msg.payload.parent,
    "parent_id": objectid(msg.fromApp.parent_id)
};
delete msg.payload.id
return msg;
